Okayâ€¦ Not to be a downer or anything but I just wanted to say this and put this out there. As a young black female I used to be talked about because I listened to some of his songs and actually liked them. And I just recently realized now that Iâ€™m older one of the main reasons why I liked them ( ESPECIALLY this song in particular) is because how he talked about females in his music because the â€œboysâ€ AND â€œmenâ€  in the black community would never or hardly talk about a female the way he does in this song especially a black woman. It actually made me feel valued for more than just the physical.
